title: (x) "Bagatellemat gjort forståelig" futuristic sans - Enabler {Angel}
content:
Hello, does anybody know the name of this typeface?

comments.content:
Enabler.

[http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ALT0000105](http://web.archive.org/web/20080709010730/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ALT0000105 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ALT0000105")
